text:
It's been 7 months since we enrolled our son in Global tots and we had a very smooth journey and wish the same continues. We really love the infrastructure of the school which gives us the homely atmosphere and their outdoor garden and classroom is very spacious. Teachers are very polite and we could able to see very nice bond between our kid and the teachers. We love their curriculum which involves learning with reusable and creative activities currated by the staff.
Currently we are getting the food timetable which includes only lunch menu. It will be helpful if the management adds the breakfast and snack details in the menu for us to have a track on their food intake in school.

We sent our 2 years old daughter here. The activities for kids are actually very helpful in developing their general awareness and daily life-skills. Staff is very nice, kind and caring towards kids. Admin processes are quite smooth.

We enrolled our child at 3 months old to the school's Infant Care. It's been 9 months already and we are very satisfied with commitment of the teachers, the regular feedback and communication with the parents. Thank you Global Tots Preschool.

Our child has been going to Global Tots Mountbatten over 6 months now. Only good things to say about the school. Teachers are nice, caring and professional. A lot of activites. Parents are kept up to date. Most importantly our child likes to go there every school morning.

The teachers here are all very good. My daughter has been studying here since she was 2 years old. She likes it very much. She likes the teachers here and they are all very nice to her. She often sings the songs taught by the teachers when she goes home. The kindergarten also has its own outdoor playground.
